rooms.description: Minimalist design with open space for family gatherings, aligning entrance with east according to Vastu.
Spacious living area with ample natural light from south-facing windows, designed in a minimalist aesthetic.
Compact dining space integrated with the living room for family meals; positioned to ensure smooth flow between spaces.
Modern minimalist kitchen with functional design and ample counter space, placed adjacent to dining area.
Utility bathroom near the kitchen, designed for functionality.

openings.description: A wide entry that welcomes sunlight and fresh air into the space.
Large south-facing windows for optimal natural light in living areas.

rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with en-suite bathroom; designed for privacy and comfort.
Secondary bedroom suitable for guest or children's use; minimalist layout ensuring ample space.
Additional bedroom following minimalist design principles.
Fourth bedroom with ample storage space and simple decor.
Quiet reading nook/library positioned in a corner with north-east exposure for calm ambience.
Central hallway connecting bedrooms and library; integrated storage solutions.

openings.description: East-facing windows in bedrooms for energizing morning light.
Small balcony area accessible from the master bedroom to provide fresh air and views.
